class.name: OpenXRSpatialCapabilityConfigurationAprilTag
class.brief_description: Configuration header for April tag markers.
class.description: Configuration header for April tag markers. Pass this to [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.create_spatial_context] to create a spatial context that can detect april tags.

method.name: get_enabled_components
method.description: Returns components enabled by this configuration. [b]Note:[/b] Only valid after this configuration was used to create a spatial context.

members.member: Dictionary to use to decode april tags. [b]Note:[/b] Must be set before using this configuration to create a spatial context.
